Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teachers have very limited time. They usually can't provide detailed feedback, or can only do so rarely. GenAI has a much greater capacity to provide feedback, however it is not always reliable.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I am more likely to trust the feedback from teachers, but also I know that the feedback from GenAI is objective and unemotive. The same can't always be said of teachers.
